name: E-commerce Dashborad
description: E-Universe Dashboard is a powerful e-commerce management tool that provides real-time insights into your online store's performance. With user-friendly features, it allows you to effortlessly monitor sales, track orders, and analyze customer data. Customizable and data-driven, E-Universe Dashboard empowers you to make informed decisions to grow your e-commerce business.

name: E-commerce Store
description: This app is an advanced e-commerce platform that allows users to browse, select, and purchase a wide range of products. It features a user-friendly client app built with React for smooth shopping experiences. A dashboard, also developed with React, provides a powerful tool for managing the online store. The server is powered by Node.js, and data is stored in a MongoDB database.

name: REST API Server
description: This is the backend server for the e-univers website, which is an E-commerce platform that allows users to browse and purchase various products online. The server provides a robust API for managing products, categories, orders, and user data.

name: DemoTv Store
description: DemoTV is an IPTV subscription store meticulously crafted using WordPress and Elementor. This dynamic combination allows us to offer an intuitive and visually stunning platform that simplifies your access to a vast array of TV channels and on-demand content. With WordPress and Elementor, DemoTV delivers a seamless, responsive, and feature-rich user experience.

name: Wiper
description: a visually appealing and responsive single product e-commerce landing page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project showcases a product with high-quality images, clear pricing, and an easy-to-use interface. It's designed to drive conversions and provide a seamless shopping experience.

name: backpack
description: a visually appealing and responsive single product e-commerce landing page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project showcases a product with high-quality images, clear pricing, and an easy-to-use interface. It's designed to drive conversions and provide a seamless shopping experience.
